wikipedia_page.main: Chris Friel (born 1959) is a British photographer noted for his abstract landscape images.

response: In 2015 he wrote the foreword for fellow photographer Chris Friel in his book, Framed published by Kozu Books.
* Chris Friel (politician), politician in the Canadian province of Ontario

The name of the album came from a discussion about the album between Teyssier and Alcest leader Neige. According to Teyssier, the main idea of the album is "to be careful not to loose more than we already lost". Prédateurs is the first work of Les Discrets for which Teyssier himself was not in charge of the cover art, which was instead the work of British photographer Chris Friel.
